guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for acetaminophen / caffeine / dihydrocodeine and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

text.html: "Individuals who are ultra-rapid metabolizers should not use codeine." See label for more information

"Ultra-Rapid Metabolism of Codeine and Other Risk Factors for Life-threatening Respiratory Depression in Children. Life-threatening respiratory depression and death have occurred in children who received codeine. Most of the reported cases occurred following tonsillectomy and/or adenoidectomy, and many of the children had evidence of being an ultra-rapid metabolizer of codeine due to CYP2D6 polymorphism." See label for more information
"Individuals who are ultra-rapid metabolizers should not use codeine." See label for more information
